Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $856,000 per year...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/3/1985, off Dwight Gooden (NYM)...
Injured on 8/11/1985 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against San Diego on 9/9/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,528,571 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1986...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,528,571 through salary arbitration...
7/26/1987: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $3,300,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1987, hitting .350 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1987...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/5/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
10/16/1990: Signed a contract extension with Detroit, $1,100,000 per year, for 2 years.
